channel.title: Genius Kitchen on Brayden's Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Genius Kitchen on Brayden's Recipes

item.title: Cross Rib Roast
item.description: Source: Genius Kitchen Ingredients 2 pounds cross-rib roast 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar 2 tablespoons minced garlic 2 teaspoons dried thyme 1 teaspoon dried rosemary 1 tablespoon salt 1 teaspoon pepper 1 tablespoon olive oil Directions Brush roast with balsamic vinegar. Make a paste with remaining ingredients and apply to meat. Roast meat at 450 for 15 minutes. Reduce heat to 350 and cook for 40 to 60 minutes, or until internal temperature reaches 125.
